allow:
Bash(RUN_DOCKER_TESTS=0 git commit --amend -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Docker testing: add plugin installation and permissions handling

- Add automatic DNS plugin installation in Docker test orchestrator
- Fix permissions on DNS data directory after plugin installation
- Update test assertion to match improved AWS CLI error message
- Ensure plugin is ready before running integration tests

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(bash -c "source tests/test_helper.bash && dns_cmd cron --enable && dns_cmd cron --enable")
Bash(bash -c "source tests/test_helper.bash && dns_cmd cron --enable >/dev/null && dns_cmd cron")

Bash(SKIP_TESTS=1 git commit -m "fix: handle read-only Docker volume in CI workflow

Copy integration test script to writable location before execution to avoid
''chmod: Read-only file system'' error in CI. The Docker volume is mounted 
read-only but we need to make the script executable.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
Bash(bash -c "source tests/test_helper.bash && cleanup_dns_data && setup_dns_provider ''aws'' && rm -f ''$PLUGIN_DATA_ROOT/TRIGGERS_ENABLED'' && ./post-create test-app")

Bash(MOCK_API_KEY="test-key" bash -c "source providers/loader.sh && load_provider ''mock'' && echo ''Current provider:'' && get_current_provider && echo ''Available providers:'' && list_available_providers")

Bash(MOCK_API_KEY="test-key" bash -c "source providers/adapter.sh && init_provider_system ''mock'' && echo ''Testing adapter functions:'' && dns_get_domain_status ''www.example.com'' ''192.168.1.100''")

Bash(SKIP_TESTS=1 git commit -m "docs: reorder phases around 1.0 release

Reorganize phases to make logical sense:
- Phases 26-27: Code quality fixes (critical and high priority) BEFORE release
- Phase 28: Pre-release testing and validation
- Phase 29: 1.0 Release
- Phase 30: Community & Support (post-release activities)
- Phases 31-32: Medium and low priority cleanup (post-1.0)

This ensures critical fixes happen before release, not after.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(SKIP_TESTS=1 git commit -m "docs: add installation issues to Phase 26

Add todos for fixing installation detection:
- Remove deprecated ''default DNS provider'' concept
- Add DigitalOcean detection to install script
- Report multi-provider mode properly during installation
- Remove PROVIDER file creation (no longer needed)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")

Bash(SKIP_TESTS=1 git commit -am "fix: source test ENV file in post-create hook

Write DOKKU_DNS_SERVER_IP to /var/lib/dokku/services/dns/ENV in test
setup and source it in post-create hook. This ensures the environment
variable is available when the post-create trigger runs during app
creation.

Previous attempts failed because:
1. export in BATS doesn''t propagate to Dokku subprocesses
2. /var/lib/dokku/ENV isn''t automatically sourced by plugin hooks
3. Plugin config shouldn''t be modified at runtime

Solution: Use dedicated ENV file in plugin data directory that the
post-create hook explicitly sources.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
